QuestData.Title: Learning From the Dead
QuestData.Description: I heard you were traveling to Black Rook Hold.$b$bIt was once home to the legendary Lord Ravencrest, a brilliant tactician. His knowledge may be exactly what we need to give us an edge against the Duskwatch.$b$bWhile you are at the Rook, keep your eyes peeled for any books that might have survived the ages that outline the Ravencrest's strategems.
QuestData.LogDescription: Recover $1oa Books of Tactics from Black Rook Hold in Val'sharah.
QuestData.RewardText: Excellent. The knowledge in these books should prove very useful in the days to come.
